name: ValueSetMHTOCAMI
title: MH TOC SMM ValueSet for the Acute Myocardial Infarction
description: A ValueSet comprised of ICD-10-CM and ICD-9-CM diagnosis codes for the SMM Acute Myocardial Infarction Indicator. The codes in the ValueSet should be monitored for changes as they vary by source and may be updated.
